```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
source("curation_scripts.R")
per.file.clinical <- GetS3Table(file.path(s3, "ClinicalData/ProcessedData/Integrated/per.file.clinical.txt"))
```

## Summary statistics


```{r}
df <- per.file.clinical %>% 
  select(Patient, Study, Sample_Name, Sample_Type_Flag, File_Name, 
         File_Name_Actual, Sequencing_Type, Disease_Status, Disease_Type) %>% 
  group_by(Study)



  df %>% summarise_all(mean)

```
